body.name: ASUS TUF GAMING B760M-PLUS WIFI 6 D4 Intel(13th and 12th Gen)LGA 1700 mATX motherboard,PCIe 5.0,2xPCIe 4.0 M.2 slots,DDR4,2.5Gb LAN,USB 3.2 Gen 2x2 Type-C,front USB 3.2 Type-C,Thunderbolt (USB4®)
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: Intel LGA 1700 socket: Ready for 13th Gen Intel Core processors and 12th Gen Intel Core, Pentium Gold and Celeron Processors
Enhanced power solution: 12plus1 DrMOS power stages, six-layer PCB, 8plus4 ProCool sockets, military-grade TUF components and Digiplus VRM for maximum durability
Comprehensive cooling: Enlarged VRM heatsinks, M.2 heatsinks, PCH heatsink, hybrid fan headers and Fan Xpert 4
Latest connectivity: PCIe 5.0 slot, PCIe 4.0 M.2 slots, rear USB 3.2 Gen 2x2 Type-C, front panel header for USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C and Thunderbolt (USB4) header support
Made for online gaming: Intel WiFi 6, Realtek 2.5Gb Ethernet, TUF LANGuard
Two-way AI Noise-Cancelation: Reduces background noise from the microphone and audio output for crystal-clear communication in games or video conferences
body.description: ASUS TUF GAMING B760M-PLUS WIFI D4 takes all the essential elements of the latest 13th Gen Intel® Core™ processors and combines them with game-ready features and proven durability. Engineered with military-grade components, an upgraded power solution and a comprehensive cooling system, this motherboard offers rock-solid, stable performance for marathon gaming. Aesthetically, ASUS TUF GAMING B760M-PLUS WIFI D4 sports the new TUF Gaming logo, and incorporates simple geometric design elements to reflect the dependability and stability that defines the TUF Gaming series.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 160 ratings 4.5 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great M-ATX Motherboard!
reviews.reviewText: This mobo was perfect for my first custom build. I had been debating wether or not to use a full ATX or a M-ATX for my mid tower build, and after much consideration I chose this one as it was probably the best value for money DDR4 LGA-1700, quality motherboard available. The build quality is amazing, and the added extras are pretty nice too. It comes with quite a nice Wifi-6 antenna wich seems to be pretty good. I won't end up using it as I will be plugging my rig directly into Fiber ethernet, but it is a great option if you are a gamer.One note though, the VRM and choke heatsinks are quite large so if you have a clip-on type CPU cooler, you will have a hard time installing it. It would be better to go for a screw on type.Overall a great mobo!

reviews.reviewerName: That Guy in TNThat Guy in TN
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Runs well and performs as it should!
reviews.reviewText: Guessing the shipping slowness was from Amazon waiting on ASUS, but just glad it arrived with plenty of time to build for a young lady's Xmas. Ddr4 support for 4000mhz ram with XMP in BIOS and turning off rgb when the PC is off are just a couple of the simple things that make it nice. The kiddos love the lighting so having support for that on the board is good. Slapped a 12400f in and, easy to see from the pics, an anti-bend bracket. Runs nice and cool with an aftermarket cooler on it. 3tb for now through both nvme slots until his kiddo wants/needs more space as she's getting into digital creations. Handles the 3060 ti nicely as well. If I can remember, I'll get a pic of the completed build later to add to the review.I thought about going amd but we already had this CPU lying around so the black Friday deal on this was good enough to grab it. Good Wi-Fi and Bluetooth as well, definitely needs the strong Wi-Fi as she's the furthest from the router. Until I run ethernet wiring through the home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars excelente placa madre
reviews.reviewText: esta placa madre es excelente, calidad precio, lo tiene casi todo, no me quiero mudar aun a ddr5, siento que es una tecnología muy reciente, que va producir muchos fallos, diría yo que en un año o año y medio ya seria viable, pero mientras tanto esta motherboard va a seguir vigente muchos años, es mas que suficiente para jugar, para uso diario, tanto suave como intensivo, llego bien y en muy buen tiempo hasta Colombia, Amazon tiene muy buena logística, aunque nunca me ha salido un producto malo que requiera garantía, no dudo en que brinden una buena solución

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: For a really decent price, this motherboard fit my needs perfectly, the cpu fits snug, it had more than enough 3 and 4 pin connections for my 11 fans, and fits my 32 gigs of ddr4 ram too! Couldn’t be happier with it, I just need to do some better cable management haha.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've built several PCs throughout the years and I couldn't figure out why the TUF GAMING B760M's BIOS wouldn't boot. After checking the brand new CPU and all my cables, I realized that the onboard graphics doesn't work, because I got the BIOS screen after inserting a GPU.Now I am dealing with the BIOS not recognizing hardware to Boot and after updating the BIOS, BIOS loads directly into the EZ Flash,Furthermore, the lack of CMOS and other info in the manual is irritating. The box doesn't come with a MOBO speaker nor the traditional ASUS easy power switch pins.Normally building a PC is much easier, even with traditional ASUS MOBOs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beware of the "M"
reviews.reviewText: M stands for mini. Im certainly an idiot for not realizing this, but considering most peeople arent entrenched in the tech world and/or would immediately realize the significance of the acronym, please ber aware. I missed out on black friday deals waiting for the return. If its cheaper, theres a reason for it. I think given the already extended nature of the title for the product, that spelling out "Mini" wouldnt be too much to ask for. Thanks :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Outstanding, but be aware of the DDR4 vs. DDR5 slots.
reviews.reviewText: While it is an outstanding board, as I would expect from Asus, the lack of screws was a little shocking. I am just use to having a decent number of screws and lifts with each new motherboard. I did have an issue that appeared to be with NVidia Experience, since the error presented itself after install, but working with the Asus Tech Support we found the issue was actually with Windows 11 and an easy solution once the debugging was done.... Disabled power options - Fast Restart to prevent the system from auto-restart after shutdown. Moving to a new motherboard always has its fair number of issues and research to be done.

No me ha dado ningún problema hasta el momento, fácil de instalar con el manual y con variedad de conexiones para distintos componentes. Estoy usando está tarjeta madre con una rtx 4060 ti y un i5 gen 12 y me va de lujo en los programas y vídeo juegos

It's a great motherboard, been working fantastic for all my needs. Pay attention to the naming as while it is a micro atx board and my smooth brain skipped over that factor when buying this. Overall, I am by no means disappointed in this mb.
Actualicé del i5-11400 al i5-13600K, y esta tarjeta madre es excelente, además que me permitió seguir utilizando la RAM DDR4.
Es una buena placa madre con todo lo suficiente para un buen ensamble de tu PC el envío fue rápido no tuve problemas básicamente es una buena elección
